H0.text: Watering a garden is the activity most likely to add pollutants to the environment.

H1.text: Pulling weeds from a lawn is the activity most likely to add pollutants to the environment.

H2.text: Installing a wooden fence is the activity most likely to add pollutants to the environment.

H3.text: Burning leaves is the activity most likely to add pollutants to the environment.
